verses.verse: Now <S%G1161><s%> it happened <S%G1096><s%> on <S%G1722><s%> the second <S%G1207><s%> Sabbath <S%G4521><s%> after the first, <S%G1207><s%> that <S%G1279><s%> he <S%G846><s%> was going <S%G1279><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> the grain fields. <S%G4702><s%> His <S%G846><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%> plucked <S%G5089><s%> the heads of grain, <S%G4719><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> ate, <S%G2068><s%> rubbing <S%G5597><s%> them in <S%G5495><s%> their hands. <S%G5495><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> some <S%G5100><s%> of the Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to them, <S%G846><s%> "Why <S%G5101><s%> do you <S%G4160><s%> do that which <S%G3739><s%> is <S%G1832><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> lawful <S%G1832><s%> to do <S%G4160><s%> on <S%G1722><s%> the Sabbath day? <S%G4521><s%>"

Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> answering <S%G611><s%> <S%G4314><s%> them, <S%G846><s%> said, <S%G2036><s%> "Haven't <S%G3761><s%> you <S%G314><s%> read <S%G314><s%> <S%G3761><s%> <S%G5124><s%> what <S%G3739><s%> David <S%G1138><s%> did <S%G4160><s%> when <S%G3698><s%> he was hungry, <S%G3983><s%> he, <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> those who <S%G3588><s%> were <S%G5607><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> him; <S%G846><s%>

how <S%G5613><s%> he entered <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the house <S%G3624><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> took <S%G2983><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> ate <S%G5315><s%> the show bread, <S%G4286><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> gave <S%G1325><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> to those who were <S%G3588><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> is <S%G1832><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> lawful <S%G1832><s%> to eat <S%G5315><s%> except <S%G3361><s%> for <S%G1487><s%> the priests <S%G2409><s%> alone? <S%G3441><s%>"
He <S%G2532><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to them, <S%G846><s%> "The <S%G3754><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> of Man <S%G444><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> lord <S%G2962><s%> of <S%G2532><s%> the Sabbath. <S%G4521><s%>"

It <S%G1161><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> happened <S%G1096><s%> on <S%G1722><s%> another <S%G2087><s%> Sabbath <S%G4521><s%> that he <S%G846><s%> entered <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the synagogue <S%G4864><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> taught. <S%G1321><s%> There <S%G1563><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> a <S%G2532><s%> man <S%G444><s%> there, <S%G1563><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> his right <S%G1188><s%> hand <S%G5495><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> withered. <S%G3584><s%>

The <S%G1161><s%> scribes <S%G1122><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> the Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> watched <S%G3906><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> to see whether <S%G1487><s%> he would heal <S%G2323><s%> on <S%G1722><s%> the Sabbath, <S%G4521><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> they might find <S%G2147><s%> an accusation <S%G2724><s%> against him. <S%G846><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> he <S%G846><s%> knew <S%G1492><s%> their <S%G846><s%> thoughts; <S%G1261><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> he said <S%G2036><s%> to the man <S%G444><s%> who had <S%G2192><s%> the withered <S%G3584><s%> hand, <S%G5495><s%> "Rise up, <S%G1453><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> stand <S%G2476><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> the middle. <S%G3319><s%>" He arose <S%G450><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> stood. <S%G2476><s%>

Then <S%G3767><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> them, <S%G846><s%> "I will ask <S%G1905><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> something: <S%G5101><s%> Is it lawful <S%G1832><s%> on the Sabbath <S%G4521><s%> to do good, <S%G15><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> to do harm? <S%G2554><s%> To save <S%G4982><s%> a life, <S%G5590><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> to kill? <S%G622><s%>"

He <S%G2532><s%> looked around at <S%G4017><s%> them <S%G846><s%> all, <S%G3956><s%> and said <S%G2036><s%> to the man, <S%G444><s%> "Stretch out <S%G1614><s%> your <S%G4675><s%> hand. <S%G5495><s%>" He <S%G1161><s%> did, <S%G4160><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> his <S%G846><s%> hand <S%G5495><s%> was restored <S%G600><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> sound <S%G5199><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> the other. <S%G243><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> they <S%G846><s%> were filled <S%G4130><s%> with rage, <S%G454><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> talked <S%G1255><s%> with <S%G4314><s%> one another <S%G240><s%> about what <S%G302><s%> they <S%G5101><s%> might do <S%G4160><s%> to Jesus. <S%G2424><s%>

It <S%G1161><s%> happened <S%G1096><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> days, <S%G2250><s%> that he went out <S%G1831><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> the mountain <S%G3735><s%> to pray, <S%G4336><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> he continued <S%G2258><s%> all night <S%G1273><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> prayer <S%G4335><s%> to God. <S%G2316><s%>

When <S%G3753><s%> it was <S%G1096><s%> day, <S%G2250><s%> he called <S%G4377><s%> his <S%G846><s%> disciples, <S%G3101><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> from <S%G575><s%> them <S%G846><s%> he chose <S%G1586><s%> twelve, <S%G1427><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> he also <S%G2532><s%> named <S%G3687><s%> apostles: <S%G652><s%>

Matthew; <S%G3156><s%> Thomas; <S%G2381><s%> James, <S%G2385><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> son of Alphaeus; <S%G256><s%> Simon, <S%G4613><s%> who was called <S%G2564><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Zealot; <S%G2207><s%>
Judas <S%G2455><s%> the son of James; <S%G2385><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Judas <S%G2455><s%> Iscariot, <S%G2469><s%> who <S%G3739><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> became <S%G1096><s%> a traitor. <S%G4273><s%>

He <S%G2532><s%> came down <S%G2597><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> them, <S%G846><s%> and stood <S%G2476><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> a <S%G5117><s%> level place, <S%G3977><s%> with <S%G2532><s%> a crowd <S%G3793><s%> of his <S%G846><s%> disciples, <S%G3101><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> a great <S%G4183><s%> number <S%G4128><s%> of the people <S%G2992><s%> from <S%G575><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> Judea <S%G2449><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Jerusalem, <S%G2419><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the sea coast <S%G3882><s%> of Tyre <S%G5184><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Sidon, <S%G4605><s%> who <S%G3739><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> to hear <S%G191><s%> him <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> to be healed <S%G2390><s%> of <S%G575><s%> their <S%G846><s%> diseases; <S%G3554><s%>
as <S%G2532><s%> well as those who were troubled <S%G3791><s%> by <S%G5259><s%> unclean <S%G169><s%> spirits, <S%G4151><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> they were being healed. <S%G2323><s%>

He <S%G846><s%> lifted up <S%G1869><s%> his <S%G846><s%> eyes <S%G3788><s%> to his <S%G846><s%> disciples, <S%G3101><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> said, <S%G3004><s%> "Blessed <S%G3107><s%> are you who are poor, <S%G4434><s%> for <S%G3754><s%> yours <S%G5212><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> the Kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

Blessed <S%G3107><s%> are you who hunger <S%G3983><s%> now, <S%G3568><s%> for <S%G3754><s%> you will be filled. <S%G5526><s%> Blessed <S%G3107><s%> are you who weep <S%G2799><s%> now, <S%G3568><s%> for <S%G3754><s%> you will laugh. <S%G1070><s%>

Rejoice <S%G5463><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> that <S%G1565><s%> day, <S%G2250><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> leap for joy, <S%G4640><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> behold, <S%G2400><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> reward <S%G3408><s%> is great <S%G4183><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> heaven, <S%G3772><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> their <S%G846><s%> fathers <S%G3962><s%> did <S%G4160><s%> the <S%G2596><s%> same <S%G5023><s%> thing <S%G5024><s%> to the prophets. <S%G4396><s%>
"But <S%G4133><s%> woe <S%G3759><s%> to you <S%G5213><s%> who are rich! <S%G4145><s%> For <S%G3754><s%> you have received <S%G568><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> consolation. <S%G3874><s%>

Woe <S%G3759><s%> to you, <S%G5213><s%> you who are full <S%G1705><s%> now, <S%G3754><s%> for you <S%G5213><s%> will be hungry. <S%G3759><s%> Woe to you <S%G5213><s%> who laugh <S%G1070><s%> now, <S%G3568><s%> for <S%G3754><s%> you will mourn <S%G3996><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> weep. <S%G2799><s%>

bless <S%G2127><s%> those who curse <S%G2672><s%> you, <S%G5213><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> pray <S%G4336><s%> for <S%G5228><s%> those who mistreat <S%G1908><s%> you. <S%G5209><s%>

Give <S%G1325><s%> to everyone <S%G3956><s%> who asks <S%G154><s%> you, <S%G4571><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> don't <S%G3361><s%> ask <S%G523><s%> <S%G575><s%> him who takes away <S%G142><s%> your goods <S%G4674><s%> to give them back again. <S%G523><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> "As <S%G2531><s%> you would <S%G2309><s%> like <S%G2443><s%> people <S%G444><s%> to do to <S%G4160><s%> you, <S%G5213><s%> do <S%G4160><s%> <S%G5210><s%> exactly <S%G3668><s%> so <S%G2532><s%> to them. <S%G846><s%>

Therefore <S%G3767><s%> be <S%G1096><s%> merciful, <S%G3629><s%> even as <S%G2531><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> merciful. <S%G3629><s%>

Don't <S%G3361><s%> judge, <S%G2919><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> you <S%G2919><s%> won't <S%G3756><s%> <S%G3361><s%> be judged. <S%G2919><s%> Don't <S%G3361><s%> condemn, <S%G2613><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> you <S%G2613><s%> won't <S%G3756><s%> <S%G3361><s%> be condemned. <S%G2613><s%> Set free, <S%G630><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> you will be set free. <S%G630><s%>

"Give, <S%G1325><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> it will be given <S%G1325><s%> to you: <S%G5213><s%> good <S%G2570><s%> measure, <S%G3358><s%> pressed down, <S%G4085><s%> shaken <S%G2532><s%> together, <S%G4531><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> running over, <S%G5240><s%> will be given <S%G1325><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> you. <S%G5216><s%> <S%G2859><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> with the same <S%G846><s%> measure <S%G3358><s%> you <S%G3739><s%> measure <S%G3354><s%> it will be measured <S%G488><s%> back <S%G488><s%> to you. <S%G5213><s%>"

He <S%G1161><s%> spoke <S%G2036><s%> a parable <S%G3850><s%> to them. <S%G3385><s%> "Can <S%G1410><s%> the blind <S%G5185><s%> guide <S%G3594><s%> the blind? <S%G5185><s%> Won't <S%G3780><s%> they <S%G4098><s%> both <S%G297><s%> fall <S%G4098><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> a pit? <S%G999><s%>
